text:
Question 120) From your memory EMIL Much others out of the other sunshine pou co coa pag I love my antunes, A. 2 or + bodies in the same space. SÃ£o Paulo: Perspective, 1998.
Working with formal resources inspired by concretism, the poem reaches an expressiveness that is characterized by
A) Interruption of verbal fluency, to test the limits of rational logic.
B) Formal restructuring of the word to provoke strangeness in the reader.
C) Dispersion of verbal units, to question the meaning of memories.
D) Fragmentation of the word, to represent the narrowing of memories.
E) renewal of traditional forms, to propose a new poetic vanguard.
